articles.title: Can Tuned & SUPERCHARGED Raptors On Race Fuel Kill the TRX in a Drag Race? Run What You Brung Ep. 2 - The Fast Lane Truck
articles.description: ( https://www.imimotorsports.com ) Will a tuned, twin-turbo V6 2018 Ford Raptor AND a supercharged V8 2012 Ford Raptor take down the Ram TRX in a drag race? ...
